item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Byblos Hookah Lounge near Thayer

Byblos is a small Middle Eastern restaurant on Meeting Street near Thayer. We'll be meeting upstairs in their Hookah lounge. It is a very casual atmosphere with many comfy couches and benches to relax on. They have a full bar upstairs, and I encourage you to try some of the Middle Eastern cuisine which they bring to you from the restaurant downstairs. If you enjoy a smoke, they have many flavors to choose from. However, smoking isn't required, and thanks to that variety of flavors the place usually smells really good. Parking near Thayer can be a little tricky, so be sure to read the street signs closely.

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the chatty blonde near the bar, but we are usually a hard group to miss.
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Byblos Hookah Lounge near Thayer
